Package vmthread

Interface Summary
Operation Represents one statement of the program.
 

Class Summary
AddOperation Adds the two values on the top of the stack.
BranchOperation Jumps to a different instruction in the program.
BranchTrueOperation Branch if true.
CompareEQOperation Compare equals.
CompareGTEOperation Compare greater than or equal.
CompareGTOperation Compare greater than.
CompareLTEOperation Compare less than or equal.
CompareLTOperation Compare less than.
CompareNEQOperation Compare not equal.
DivideOperation Divides the two values on top of the stack, and pushes the result.
MultiplyOperation Multiplies the two values on top of the stack, and pushes the result.
NOPOperation Does nothing.
PopOperation Pops the value on the top of the stack and assigns it to a variable.
PushOperation Pushes a variable value or constant onto the stack.
SleepOperation Sleep operation.
SubtractOperation Subtracts the two values on top of the stack, and pushes the result.
VMThread Simple stack-based virtual machine.
VMThreadState Represents the current state of a thread.
VMThreadTest Test for SimpleVM.
YieldOperation Yields the processor to another thread.
 

Enum Summary
VMThreadState.State Possible states.
 

Exception Summary
ProgramFormatException Exception for badly formatted programs.
UndefinedVariableException Exception for undefined variables.
